Desc.entry: Economic regeneration organisation dedicated to the development of training, enterprise and employment opportunities. Delivers IT training. Runs a children's centre with nursery spaces. Has a community arts centre, the Venue (see separate entry). Offers managed work space and has offices to rent as well rooms to hire. Company limited by guarantee no 03339143.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm; seasonal evening opening, please contact for details
